  • Constructor Details

      public RegistrationSystem()

  • Method Details

    • registerUserFromInput

      public User registerUserFromInput(Scanner scanner, List<User> userList)
      Handles the entire user registration process by scanning inputs from the provided Scanner. Prompts for all necessary registration details and then calls registerUser to process the registration.
      Parameters:
      scanner - the Scanner instance for reading user input.
      userList - the global in-memory list of users.
      Returns:
      the new User object if registration is successful; null otherwise.

    • isValidNRIC

      public boolean isValidNRIC(String nric)

    • isValidName

    • registerUser

      public User registerUser(String name, String nric, int age, String maritalStatusStr, String password, String userTypeStr, List<User> userList)
      Attempts to register a new user as an applicant based on the input parameters. Validates input, checks if the NRIC already exists, and creates the correct user object. Saves the new user to the appropriate type-specific file.
      Parameters:
      name - the user's name.
      nric - the user's NRIC.
      age - the user's age.
      maritalStatusStr - the user's marital status as a string ("Single" or "Married").
      password - the user's password.
      userTypeStr - the type of user as a string (always "APPLICANT").
      userList - the global in-memory list of users.
      Returns:
      the new User object if registration is successful; null otherwise.
